full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 674 Filed 06/24/22 Page 18 of 29 To Ghislaine I say - "You broke me in unfathomable ways, to which only you, the Almighty God and I were witnesses. But you didn't break my spirit or dampen the internal flame of determination that now burns inside me brighter now than ever before!" Sarah Kansome 31-05-2022 DOJ-OGR-00010680

text_blocks.content: To Ghislaine I say - "You broke me in unfathomable ways, to which only you, the Almighty God and I were witnesses. But you didn't break my spirit or dampen the internal flame of determination that now burns inside me brighter now than ever before!"

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing with a handwritten statement and signature. The quality is generally good, but there are some speckles and dots on the page, likely due to scanning or copying.
